Abyssal Saintess Elcadia:
That was an unbelievable fight! Etis van Etina... He is the one behind everything. Embryo and Etis are scheming to find the remaining seals and take control of this world.
His power here was incomplete, and moreover his body was not real, but he was quite formidable nonetheless. I'm sure you noticed as much...
